title: Help naming this font
content:
Hey guys, i'm going nuts trying to figure out what this font is. I've used Identifont and WhatTheFont with no success.

Here's a screenshot:  
 [http://cl.ly/image/1y0E2Q1H0f3O](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317182202/http:/cl.ly/image/1y0E2Q1H0f3O)

It's also used hear, and you can type in and see all different letters:  
 [http://www.thestationerystudio.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.viewProduct&productId=38782&catId=1175](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317182202/http:/www.thestationerystudio.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.viewProduct&productId=38782&catId=1175)

I'm getting married, and someone bought us these as an engagement gift. I'd love to make other things match if I can figure out what it is!

Thanks,  
Matthew
author: mknippen

comments.content:
Help plz about name of this font. Thanks
